H0.text: The two wives of King John of England shared which forename. Eleanor

H1.text: The two wives of King John of England shared which forename. Margaret

H2.text: The two wives of King John of England shared which forename. Matilda

H3.text: The two wives of King John of England shared which forename. Isabella

A5.text: After John died in 1216, Isabella remarried in 1220 to Hugh X of Lusignan
